ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure

Class DBHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.DBHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler

    public class DBHandler
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
implements Handler
    This class implements the Handler interface which specifies a contract for a class that will store and retrieve Story objects from some sort of storage. The DBHandler will use SQLite to store stories so that users may store stories locally (cache stories).
    Author:
    Ben Dubois
